value:
$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Urgh... Hahh... Hahh...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Zacharias...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I never know when the blood will take
me... And when it does... I cannot
resist.$k$pNot I. Not Veronica. Not our father,
the emperor. Not anyone...$k$p$EFace_Anger|This dark god...seeks death. And
cries out for the destruction of Askr.$k$pYou can't have realized this, but
once...as we traveled together...I tried
to kill you.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|What? You—$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I have tried to kill myself. But even
that escape evades me...$k$p$EFace_Anger|Grrrr... Please. Kill me, before I kill
you!$k$p$EFace_Smile|Kill you... Kill you all! Heh...Hee-hee...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Zacharias!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Zacharias...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|What's stopping you? Kill me!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You're our friend, Zacharias. I
cannot kill a friend.$k$pI wish you had told us about this
sooner... Why did you wait?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I knew you would be too kind... No
matter the danger, no matter what
I said...you'd try to save me.$k$pRegardless of the cost. I know you
well enough to know that.$k$pHow could I tell you?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Zacharias, I'm going to say this only
once. You're a member of the Order
of Heroes. You can't just quit.$k$pIf you can't fight your blood alone...
We'll find a way to fight it—together.$k$pWe travel countless worlds... Surely,
one of them must hold the key to
freeing you.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|So you say, Commander. But I have
searched...$k$pI've traveled from realm to realm... But
it's like seeking one grain of sand in a
vast desert. My hope is gone.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|If you know Alfonse, and you know
us... Then you know that we could
never kill you once we knew the truth.$k$pYour plan—to hide your identity,
become our enemy, and be killed by
us—has failed.$k$pIf you care for Alfonse and Sharena...
If you want to see them live...then
you will never give up. We won't.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I have no choice but to return to
Embla. You should head back to
Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Can't you come with us?$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I am sorry, Sharena. I cannot. Before
long, I will try to kill you.$k$pI will stop seeking my own death. I
will resume my search across the
realms...$k$pThere must be a path that leads to
freedom.$k$pI'm counting on you to look after my
friends, $Nu.$k$pAnd if I ever make another attempt
on Alfonse or Sharena's life...$k$pKill me. Consider it my last request...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Zacharias...$k$p$Sbs150|
